name: Day of the Dave
description:
Become zombie Dave who has been woken by an earthquake, who is now very hungry! 

Eat brains..

Avoid real food..

Obtain high score!

Dev blog page: https://clairegoh.wixsite.com/flowrider/dayofthedave

Controls: Please read the 'Read Me' file for controls for Windows and Android versions.

Credits:

  • Design, Art, Programming - Claire Langton - Goh (Devillia59)
  • Audio source - Freesound.org CC0 License 

Feedback welcome!

Enjoy the game!
